My thoughts. Usually whatever comes to my mind. I enjoy sharing and caring.

note: She/her Library worker for 45+ years now granny, #gardening, #knitting, NAMI, PFLAG, 12step, #basenjis, #Godzilla

Terminal scholar of lit and bibliophile who collects new hobbies constantly. I love gardening, writing, photography, SF, and the ghost story/haunted house tale. Current obsession is with paper, notebooks, and pens, specifically Travelers Notebooks. Academic projects currently include Multicultural Speculative Fictions, Black Speculative Fictions, World SF, Inquiry Based Writing Pedagogies, and Creative Writing Pedagogies. A bit of a foodie and sometimes cook and bake as well.

I am Jane Thomas, sex researcher and educator. I explain sexual response, suggest ideas for sex play and help couples understand the emotional and sexual needs of the opposite sex. My books are for sale on Amazon. Please take a look at my website Nosper.com : the gateway to all my research, books & articles! Please feel free to contact me! #Sexology #sexuality #SexEducation

Aside from all that, I live in the East Village of Manhattan.

I came here from reddit (same username). Pronouns she/they. 33/East Coast USA. #BlackLivesMatter. Political affiliations considered progressive and am also a Pokemon gaming fan, please don't follow if that bothers you. I am bisexual, have a visibly disabled partner, and am invisibly disabled myself. Trans people are welcome here. Life is a preposterous horror.

Money speaks for money, the devil for his own
Who comes to speak for the skin and the bone?

The law locks up the man or woman
Who steals the goose off the common
But leaves the greater villain loose
Who steals the common from the goose.
